channel.title: Let There Be Code
channel.description: Recent content on Let There Be Code

item.title: A little bit about myself
item.description: I have been working as a software engineer since 2007. I have developed, managed, analysed enterprise applications and solutions in many companies. I mainly use C# as my primary programming language but can work with other OOP languages either. I have specialized at back-end and performance optimizations in applications. I actively participate in deployments, management and optimizations in projects and can easily identify myself as DevOps.
